column4: hello, ive installed ms windows right after install ubuntu and i cant boot ubuntu anymore, how can i fix such problem
this guide is confusing for beginners
i dont know how to mount the ubuntu partition to my places thing
feel free to pm me if you want a walkthrough
the problem you would have is not being able to pipe direct3d from windows guest into opengl calls on the ubuntu host

if you want 3d graphics in both systems usually people run win7 as the host and ubuntu as the guest and install the guest additions to ubuntu. i don't know of any guest additions for windows that would enable 3d graphics with an ubuntu host
you are already on 11.04 so dist-upgrade is not needed it would take you to 11.10 which isn't available
the two are incompatible at least until 11.10
Is it confirmed that compatibility will be fixed by 11.10?
i read a blog saying they were already starting the process of porting unity to gtk3 which would be needed to support both on the same system
thanks, I can wait for a while
assume you are the same ubuntu_ from earlier i think you will need to solve that problem and the fakeraid to get anything to work. do you know if grub will play nice with your fakeraid
there isn't much point in working on one without a solution for the other. ask here or in #grub if grub2 will support fakeraid stripping with your chipset
sudo apt-get install apt-file; apt-file nm-applet
that should tell you what to install
no its a tool to tell you where to find a program. apt-file search nm-applet. once you know what package you can just install that
apt will make sure to install all the things that said package needs
sounds like grub is missing some modules but you shouldn't need the aufs component anyways
are you running a stock kernel?
ok then yes you would need aufs. im not sure this would work. what exactly do you want to do
can you back up a bit, and describe what you want to do. you probably want to be using usb-creator-gtk
you cannot use usb-creator-gtk on the same usb you just booted. so yes you need two
yea i no my problem now thanks :)
